revisions.rev:
The following galleries display the '''official [[Seal (emblem)|emblem]]s of the [[States of India|28 states]] and [[Union Territory|7 union territories]] of [[India]]:
==States== <gallery> File:Seal_of_Andhra_Pradesh.svg|<center>[[Andhra Pradesh]] File:Seal of Arunachal Pradesh.jpg|<center>[[Arunachal Pradesh]] File:Seal of Assam.png|<center>[[Seal of Assam|Seal of]] [[Assam]] File:Seal of Bihar.jpg|<center>[[Seal of Bihar|Seal of]] [[Bihar]] File:Seal of Chhattisgarh.gif|<center>[[Chhattisgarh]] File:Seal of Goa.png|<center>[[Seal of Goa|Seal of]] [[Goa]] File:Seal of Gujarat.svg|<center>[[Seal of Gujarat|Seal of]] [[Gujarat]] File:Seal of Haryana.jpg|<center>[[Haryana]] File:Seal of Himachal Pradesh.jpg|<center>[[Himachal Pradesh]] File:Seal of Jammu and Kashmir color.png|<center>[[Seal of Jammu and Kashmir|Seal of]] [[Jammu and Kashmir]] File:Seal_of_Jharkhand.png|<center>[[Jharkhand]] File:Seal of Karnataka.svg|<center>[[Seal of Karnataka|Seal of]] [[Karnataka]] File:Seal of Kerala.svg|<center>[[Seal of Kerala|Seal of]] [[Kerala]] File:Seal of Madhya Pradesh.png|<center>[[Madhya Pradesh]] File:Seal of Maharashtra.png |<center>[[Maharashtra]] File:Seal of Manipur.gif|<center>[[Manipur]] File:Seal of Meghalaya.gif|<center>[[Meghalaya]] File:Seal of Mizoram.svg|<center>[[Seal of Mizoram|Seal of]] [[Mizoram]] File:Seal of Nagaland.png|<center>[[Nagaland]] File:Seal of Orissa.gif|<center>[[Orissa]] File:Seal of Punjab.gif|<center>[[Punjab (India)|Punjab]] File:Seal of Rajasthan.jpg|<center>[[Rajasthan]] File:Seal of Sikkim color.png|<center>[[Seal of Sikkim|Seal of]] [[Sikkim]] File:Seal_of_Tamil_Nadu.jpg|<center>[[Seal of Tamil Nadu|Seal of]] [[Tamil Nadu]] File:Seal of Tripura.svg|<center>[[Seal of Tripura|Seal of]] [[Tripura]] File:Seal of Uttar Pradesh.png|<center>[[Uttar Pradesh]] File:Seal of Uttarakhand.png|<center>[[Uttarakhand]] File:Seal of West Bengal.svg|<center>[[West Bengal]] </gallery>
==Union territories== Most still use the Emblem of India modified with the territory name. <gallery>
File:Emblem of India.svg|<center>[[Andaman and Nicobar Islands]] File:Seal of Dadra and Nagar Haveli.svg|<center>[[Dadra and Nagar Haveli]] File:Seal of Daman and Diu.svg|<center>[[Daman and Diu]] File:Seal of Chandigarh.png|<center>[[Chandigarh]] File:Seal of Puducherry.svg|<center>[[Puducherry]] File:Emblem of India.svg|<center>[[National Capital Territory of Delhi]] </gallery>
==See also== * [[National Emblem of India]]
